# ecb-exchange-rates-ts

> TypeScript client for the European Central Bank exchange rate API. Zero dependencies, ~2 KB minified. Fetches daily reference rates for 31 currencies via the ECB SDMX REST API. Requires Node.js >= 20 (native fetch). No API key needed.

The package name on npm is `ecb-exchange-rates-ts`. Install with `npm install ecb-exchange-rates-ts`.

The main export is the `EcbClient` class. All methods are async and return typed results. The ECB only publishes rates on business days (no weekends, holidays, or future dates). Dates must be in YYYY-MM-DD format. Currency codes must be 3-letter uppercase ISO 4217 (e.g. "USD", "GBP", "JPY"). The default base currency is EUR but is configurable per-client or per-query.
